mapper.select: select sound.* from sound sound join album album on sound.a_no=album.a_no join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where album.a_no=#{a_no}

select artist.artist_name from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}

select sound.*, artist.artist_name from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no join album album on sound_a_no = album.a_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}

select s_name, s_path, artist.artist_name, album.a_cover from sound sound join album album on sound.a_no = album.a_no join singer singer on sound.s_no = singer.s_no and sound.a_no = singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where (sound.a_no, sound.s_no) in
(#{item.a_no},#{item.s_no})
order by sound.s_no asc
